name: PseudoTCPBase_notifyMTUTest
description: Unit tests for the notifyMTU method in PseudoTCPBase class.

test_cases.name: testNotifyMTU_EstablishedState
test_cases.description: Tests the notifyMTU method when the state is TCP_ESTABLISHED.

test_cases.name: testNotifyMTU_NonEstablishedState
test_cases.description: Tests the notifyMTU method when the state is TCP_LISTEN.
